word_mean: 膜，衣，鞘：卵膜(包括第1、第2和第3卵膜)的总称。也用来作为词尾，指鞘、膜，如neurilemma(神经鞘，神经膜)和oolemma(卵膜)

sentence.Network_en: Note that this proof uses the strong version of the ArtinRees lemma.
sentence.Network_cn: 请注意这个证明使用了Artin-Rees引理的强形式.

sentence.Network_en: Sperner's lemma concerns the decomposition of a simplex into smaller simplices.
sentence.Network_cn: 斯波纳引理涉及到把一个单纯形分解为较小的单纯形的问题.

sentence.Network_en: We shall prove the following ungainly technical lemma.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们来证明下面的冗长的技术性的引理.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: via Latin from Greek lēmma 'something assumed'; related to lambanein 'take'
mid 18th cent. (denoting the husk or shell of a fruit): from Greek, from lepein 'to peel'

means.word_mean: 1. a subsidiary proposition that is assumed to be true in order to prove another proposition
2. the lower and stouter of the two glumes immediately enclosing the floret in most Gramineae
3. the head of an annotation or gloss
